Change history
**************

1.0 (2014-02-01)
----------------

- Updated to support Plone 4.2 and 4.3.


1.0rc1 (2012-06-26)
-------------------

- Users are no created in an initial "Unapproved" or "Pending" state, so it's
  possible to distinguish unapproved users from disapproved users.


1.0a2 (2012-05-31)
------------------

- Bugfixes.


1.0a1 (2012-05-29)
------------------

- Initial release
